pages.authorize.agree-title: You agree that {{ app }} will be able to:
signup-beta-desc: Needed to draw accounts that will take part in beta testing.
signup-email-desc: Used for sign in to all our games
signup-username-desc: Register your username before someone else does.
signup-news-checkbox: I agree to receive information, news, events and commercial offers of RutsuKun Accounts
signup-privacypolicyandtos-checkbox: I understand and agree to Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
app-not-verified-desc: The ownership of this app has not been verified by RutsuKun Accounts. Continue if you know and trust the developer of this app.
ACCOUNT_EMAIL_VERIFIED: The email address has been verified
ACCOUNT_EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Account email doesn't verified, check your e-mail and click on the activation link
ACCOUNT_CREATED_DESC: Your account has been created, activate it with the link we sent to your email address.
copyright: Copyright Â© 2021 RutsuKun Accounts. All rights reserved.
